0110000010100010 1101001011101010 1 -> sum: 0011001110001101, cout: 1

0001010010100111 1010100011101100 0 -> sum: 1011110110010011, cout: 0
0111011001011001 1000111010011010 0 -> sum: 0000010011110011, cout: 1
